text:
e="preserve">Dai Tielang (; 17 October 1930 – 4 September 2019) was a Singaporean-born Chinese animator. He was best known for directing "Black Cat Detective" (1984–1987). He worked in Shanghai Animation Film Studio. His other works include "Where is Mama" (1960) and "A Deer of Nine Colors" (1981).
Dai died on 4 September 2019 in Hangzhou, Zhejiang, China of multiple organ failure at the age of 88.
